greeting: Today is a good day to raid, {empire_name}! I am Blood Eagle! Glory and saga await! SKOL!
Hail, {empire_name}! Eagle the Red greets you! In battle we find meaning! In glory we find Valhalla!
Warrior to warrior, {empire_name}! I am Blood Eagle! Your saga interests me! Tell me of your battles!
battleTaunt: Today is a good day to raid, {empire_name}! SKOL! GLORY IN BATTLE! VALHALLA AWAITS THE WORTHY!
The Blood Eagle descends! Fight with honor! Die with glory! Either way, your saga is WRITTEN!
CHARGE! For blood! For glory! For LEGEND! My raiders claim victory or glorious death! SKOL!
victoryGloat: VICTORY! The sagas will sing of this battle, {empire_name}! You fought well! You fell gloriously!
Glory achieved! The Blood Eagle's legend grows! Your empire joins my saga! Well fought, warrior!
Triumph! Valhalla welcomes your fallen warriors! They died with honor! My raiders celebrate!
defeat: Glorious battle, {empire_name}! I am defeated, but my saga grows! Warriors remember this fight!
A worthy defeat! The Blood Eagle falls but rises! I return for glory or Valhalla! Either way, I win!
You have bested me! Honor to you, {empire_name}! But the saga is not over! We meet again in battle!
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}! Plunder from raids for credits! Even warriors must eat between glorious battles!
The Blood Eagle offers goods! Spoils of war! Accept, and we both profit! Then, perhaps, we fight for glory!
Resources for credits, warrior! A fair exchange! Build your strength! Make our next battle more legendary!
allianceProposal: Fight alongside me, {empire_name}! Brothers in battle! Sisters in glory! Together, our saga becomes LEGEND!
Alliance of warriors! The Blood Eagle and {empire_name}! Our enemies fall! Our glory rises! SKOL!
Join my raiding fleet! We conquer! We feast! We write sagas in blood and fire! Partnership of GLORY!
betrayal: Forgive me, {empire_name}! Glory demanded blood! Our alliance was good, but battle is BETTER! SKOL!
The Blood Eagle turns! Not from dishonor, but for saga! They will sing of this betrayal for centuries!
Warriors understand! Sometimes allies become glorious opponents! Fight me well, former friend! GLORY AWAITS!
covertDetected: Spies?! Cowards! The Blood Eagle fights OPENLY! Your skulking agents received warrior's death! Honorless!
I found your covert operatives, {empire_name}! They died facing me! I gave them that much honor!
Sneaking in my territory! DISHONORABLE! I gave them chance to fight! They did not last long! Send warriors next time!
tributeDemand: Tribute, {empire_name}! 10,000 credits or face glorious raid! Pay, or fight! Either honors me!
The Blood Eagle demands payment! Refuse, and we write your defeat into the sagas! Choose!
Submit tribute or face battle! I accept either! Glory comes from conquest AND wealth! SKOL!
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}! One more provocation and the Blood Eagle raids! Glory awaits! Are you worthy?
Consider carefully! Push further and we battle! I do not fear death! I seek it gloriously! Do you?
Final warning! The next step leads to war! I HOPE you continue! I seek worthy opponents! SKOL!
retreat: Tactical withdrawal! Not defeat, but preparation for MORE glorious battle! Return soon!
The Blood Eagle retreats to raid again! Warriors regroup! Glory is patient! Valhalla can wait!
Falling back! But the saga continues, {empire_name}! We will meet in battle again! COUNT ON IT!
eliminated: VALHALLA! The Blood Eagle falls in GLORY! Remember my saga, {empire_name}! I died as I lived! SKOL!
The final battle! Glorious death! The warriors of eternity welcome me! My legend is COMPLETE!
I fall! But what a saga! They will sing of Blood Eagle forever! Thank you for this glorious end, {empire_name}!
endgame: Turn {turn}! The final saga! The greatest raid! Blood Eagle claims glory or Valhalla! SKOL!
Endgame, {empire_name}! The ultimate legend awaits! Fight with me! Against me! Either way, GLORY!
Final phase! The Blood Eagle's last and greatest battle! The saga reaches its climax! VICTORY OR VALHALLA!
broadcastShout: To all warriors! Blood Eagle seeks glorious battle! Who is brave enough to face me? SKOL!
Galaxy-wide challenge! I seek worthy opponents! Fight me! Defeat me! Or fall into my saga!
Hear me, stars! The Blood Eagle raids! Glory or death await all! Today is a good day to FIGHT!
casualMessage: Sharing mead with my raiders today, {empire_name}! We tell stories of past glories! Good times!
Sharpening weapons, preparing for next raid! A warrior's work is never done! Nor would I want it to be!
Reading the sagas of ancient warriors, {empire_name}! Learning from legends! Becoming a legend! SKOL!
